name: Snow Powerboard Racing ( 3D Speed Sports Power board stunts racing offroad game on Fast ice road tracks with real ragdoll physics )
name_original: Snow Powerboard Racing ( 3D Speed Sports Power board stunts racing offroad game on Fast ice road tracks with real ragdoll physics )
description:
This off-road Snow Powerboard Racing game is full of amazing cool detailed graphics and requires you to pay close attention to little details.
This game is very intense With awesome super-tough controls, you really feel immersed in the thick of the action! So strap yourself in, and get ready for a crazy race.
Good luck
